query.queryText: SELECT w_filial, w_ruc, w_fecha, w_grupo, w_nombre_grupo, w_reunion

SELECT "Fecha" = (SELECT CONVERT (VARCHAR (10),op_fecha_liq ,?) FROM cob_cartera..ca_operacion WHERE TG.tg_operacion = op_operacion ),"Cliente" = (SELECT CONVERT (VARCHAR,en_ente ) + " " + en_nomlar FROM cobis..cl_ente WHERE en_ente = TG.tg_cliente ),"Otorgado" = (SELECT ISNULL (op_monto, 0) FROM cob_cartera..ca_operacion WHERE TG.tg_operacion = op_operacion ),"Saldo Cap." = (SELECT SUM (am_cuota) - SUM (am_pagado) + SUM (am_gracia) FROM cob_cartera..ca_amortizacion WHERE TG.tg_operacion = am_operacion AND am_concepto = "CAP" ),"Ahorros" = ISNULL ((SELECT SUM (ISNULL (cp_ahorro, 0)) + SUM (ISNULL (cp_extras, 0)) FROM cob_cartera..ca_control_pago WHERE TG.tg_operacion = cp_operacion ), 0),"Capital" = (SELECT SUM (am_cuota) - SUM (am_pagado) + SUM (am_gracia) FROM cob_cartera..ca_amortizacion ,cob_cartera..ca_dividendo WHERE TG.tg_operacion = am_operacion AND am_operacion = di_operacion AND am_concepto = "CAP" AND di_estado NOT IN (?,?) ),"INT + Otros" = (SELECT SUM (am_cuota) - SUM (am_pagado) + SUM (am_gracia) FROM cob_cartera..ca_amortizacion ,cob_cartera..ca_dividendo WHERE TG.tg_operacion = am_operacion AND am_operacion = di_operacion AND am_concepto <> "CAP" AND di_estado NOT IN (?,?) ),"TOTAL" = (SELECT SUM (am_cuota) - SUM (am_pagado) + SUM (am_gracia) FROM cob_cartera..ca_amortizacion ,cob_cartera..ca_dividendo WHERE TG.tg_operacion = am_operacion AND am_operacion = di_operacion AND di_estado NOT IN (?,?) )
